name: Se7enSins - GTA V UserStyle
description: Alternate Se7enSins Style created by Holo
additional_info:
Logo and Header by Holo
Idea by Krafty
CSS for the logo by Autonamus
CSS colour edits by Alex

------------------------------------------------

Please be sure to forward all colour issues to Alex, I can try and get these ironed out as soon as possible. This style is the first major test user style we (Holo and I) have done, so please be patient. Hopefully one we have this nailed down to a T we can create more custom ones for the community should they want to see more.

------------------------------------------------

Listed at the top we have Autonamus and Krafty, without Autonamus we wouldn't have a decent code to replace the logo, so thank him when you have a chance. Krafty is a special guy, without him we wouldn't have been able to come up with this. He shared his work with us so we could change the banner and use our own, thank him to.

------------------------------------------------

Special thanks:

Adzee - Testing the style
NixFifty - Testing the style and helping me (Alex) out with the CSS.
